segments.text: I can't believe my eyes with this kitchen chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's faucet is on full blast, water cascading over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the woman drying dishes hasn't turned around once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting soaked from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked bowls on the counter look ready to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the boy on the stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar, so bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl's beside him, palm up for a cookie handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're totally ignoring the water hazard nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is serene, totally at odds with this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a simple kitchen could hide such surprises?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm shocked no one's shouting to stop this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
